metadata.Title: CVE-2019-25031 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
** DISPUTED ** Unbound before 1.9.5 allows configuration injection in create_unbound_ad_servers.sh upon a successful man-in-the-middle attack against a cleartext HTTP session. NOTE: The vendor does not consider this a vulnerability of the Unbound software. create_unbound_ad_servers.sh is a contributed script from the community that facilitates automatic configuration creation. It is not part of the Unbound installation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-25031` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunbound8 - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.2
python-unbound - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.2
python3-unbound - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.2
unbound - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.2
unbound-anchor - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.2
unbound-host - 1.9.4-2ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unbound package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.4-2ubuntu1.2').
